Uses of Class
main.java.indexer.server.models.Batch

  • Packages that use Batch 
    Package Description
    main.java.indexer.server.daos
    The DAOS are the database access objects and handle all Create, Read, Update, and Delete operations on the Indexer Database.
    main.java.indexer.server.models
    The models represent the data from the database while in memory and are used to pass information from the server to the client and vice versa.

    • Uses of Batch in main.java.indexer.server.daos

      Methods in main.java.indexer.server.daos that return Batch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Batch BatchDAO.createBatch(Batch batch)
      Adds the given batch to the database
      Batch BatchDAO.readBatch(java.lang.String batchId)
      Reads from the database and returns the batch with the given batchId
      Batch BatchDAO.updateBatch(Batch batch)
      Updates the given batch in the database
      Methods in main.java.indexer.server.daos that return types with arguments of type Batch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.util.List<Batch> BatchDAO.readBatchesForProject(Project project)
      Reads and returns all batches for a given project from the database
      Methods in main.java.indexer.server.daos with parameters of type Batch 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Batch BatchDAO.createBatch(Batch batch)
      Adds the given batch to the database
      void BatchDAO.deleteBatch(Batch batch)
      Delete the given batch from the database
      void RecordDAO.deleteRecordsForBatch(Batch batch)
      Deletes all records for the given batch
      java.util.List<Record> RecordDAO.readRecordsForBatch(Batch batch)
      Returns all records from a given batch
      Batch BatchDAO.updateBatch(Batch batch)
      Updates the given batch in the database
